llm_patterns.name: Temporal Pattern LLM
llm_patterns.description: Specialized in identifying time-based behavioral patterns in customer data

discovered_patterns.title: Tuesday Evening Browsers
discovered_patterns.description: Users who browse on Tuesday evenings (6-10pm) show distinct purchase patterns and product preferences
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of 3,245 users across 1.48+ million events showed consistent Tuesday evening patterns
discovered_patterns.implementation: Create Tuesday evening-specific promotions and content releases

discovered_patterns.title: Weekend Comparison Shoppers
discovered_patterns.description: Users who browse on weekends are 3.2x more likely to be comparison shopping across multiple sites
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of 5,876 weekend browsers showed distinct comparison shopping patterns
discovered_patterns.implementation: Deploy weekend-specific competitive comparison content and offers

llm_patterns.name: Emotional Analysis LLM
llm_patterns.description: Focused on detecting emotional states from behavioral patterns

discovered_patterns.title: Seasonal Color Preference Shifts
discovered_patterns.description: User color preferences shift predictably with seasons, with specific emotional triggers
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of product color selection patterns across 42,845 customers showed seasonal shifts
discovered_patterns.implementation: Implement dynamic color schemes based on seasonal psychology

discovered_patterns.title: Post-Payday Emotional Spending
discovered_patterns.description: Users show distinct emotional spending patterns 1-3 days after typical paydays
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of 7,654 users showed spending pattern shifts aligned with common paydays
discovered_patterns.implementation: Create payday-aligned promotional strategies with emotional triggers

llm_patterns.name: Cross-Platform LLM
llm_patterns.description: Specialized in connecting behaviors across different platforms and devices

discovered_patterns.title: Cross-Device Purchase Journey
discovered_patterns.description: Users who research on mobile but purchase on desktop follow specific cross-device patterns
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of 5,432 users showed consistent device-switching behavior before purchase
discovered_patterns.implementation: Create seamless cross-device experiences with persistent carts

discovered_patterns.title: Email-to-Social Conversion Path
discovered_patterns.description: Users who engage with email then visit via social media have 2.7x higher conversion rate
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of 3,876 users across Klaviyo and Amplitude data showed this cross-platform pattern
discovered_patterns.implementation: Create coordinated email and social media campaigns with consistent messaging

llm_patterns.name: Demographic Inference LLM
llm_patterns.description: Focused on identifying demographic patterns without explicit demographic data

discovered_patterns.title: Style Evolution Pathway
discovered_patterns.description: Users who gradually shift their style preferences over multiple sessions show high lifetime value potential
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of 3,456 users showed progressive style journey patterns
discovered_patterns.implementation: Create personalized style journey content and recommendations

discovered_patterns.title: Life Event Shopping Patterns
discovered_patterns.description: Specific browsing patterns strongly indicate major life events (moving, new job, etc.)
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of 2,987 users showed distinct shopping patterns preceding life events
discovered_patterns.implementation: Deploy life event detection and relevant product recommendations

llm_patterns.name: Purchase Intent LLM
llm_patterns.description: Specialized in detecting subtle purchase intent signals in browsing behavior

discovered_patterns.title: Image Zoom Purchase Intent Signal
discovered_patterns.description: Users who zoom on product images show specific purchase intent patterns that vary by product category
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of 9,876 users with image zoom behavior showed strong purchase intent correlation
discovered_patterns.implementation: Deploy zoom-triggered detail expansions and recommendations

discovered_patterns.title: Payment Method Hesitation Pattern
discovered_patterns.description: Users who hesitate at payment method selection show specific concerns that can be addressed
discovered_patterns.evidence: Analysis of 6,543 users showed distinct hesitation patterns at payment selection
discovered_patterns.implementation: Create dynamic payment method presentations with tailored messaging
